title: Further Glycerin Soap- 16 oz. Dish Soap
features: Our signature fragrance is made from the oils of bergamot, olive and grass.
Further natural soap is made from the glycerin derived from the distillation of biofuel.
Further glycerin soap is never tested on animals. Share this item:
description: Our natural soap for dish washing is derived from making biofuel.
